thread.title: Jacob Schweyer
thread.title_full: Warrior Trading reviewed by Jacob Schweyer

author: Jacob Schweyer
title: Jacob Schweyer
text:
Warrior Trading is excellent- Ross, Jeff, Mike, and the rest of the team strive for excellence and it is obvious by the way they organize their community and by the way they run their day to day operations. Ross's Warrior Pro course is transformative- from the very first class you learn everything you need to be successful as a trader, and you are given every resource to be successful. But they don't stop there, on top of very well thought out video lessons, the entire team is extremely approachable- when you are looking for a trading mentorship, this is of utmost importance, because when you can send your ideas to a team who trades successful and profitably almost every day, they will teach you how to think and act like the most successful traders.
If you are on the fence about the Warrior Community- you should definitely give it a try, you will not be let down.
-Jake S
